Fire Detection System Commissioning

Name: Fire Detection System Commissioning
Tag 1: Fire Detection System Commissioning

Name: Test each Smoke Detector
Tag 1: Test each Smoke Detector in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA using smoke can and record FIP alarm.

Name: Test each thermal Detector
Tag 1: Test each thermal Detector in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA using a heat detector tester kit can and record FIP alarm.

Name: Test Speakers
Tag 1: Test Speakers in accordance with AS1670 & BCA under general fire alarm and record results using a sound probe meter

Name: Test Visual Alarm Devices
Tag 1: Test Visual Alarm Devices in accordance with AS1670 & BCA under general fire alarm

Name: Test WIP phones
Tag 1: Test WIP phones in accordance AS1670, BCA

Name: Test Manual Call Points
Tag 1: Test Manual Call Points in accordance with AS1670, BCA and record FIP/EWIS alarm

Name: Test Field Module Interfaces
Tag 1: Test Field Module Interfaces in accordance with AS1670, AS1668, BCA and record FIP alarm (take a photo of the Interface and FIP the the same time)

Name: Test activation of smoke/fire door magnetic hold open devices
Tag 1: Test the activation of smoke/fire door magnetic hold open devices under local fire alarm

Name: Test activation of mechanical fire trips
Tag 1: test the activation of mechanical fire trips under general fire alarm

Name: Test activation of security fire trips
Tag 1: Test the activation of security fire trips under general fire alarm

Name: Test EWIS/OWS time delay for cascading
Tag 1: Test the EWIS/OWS time delay for cascading and changing from ALERT to EVAC (record a video of the EWIS/OWS Panel)

Name: Test activation of network monitoring
Tag 1: Test the activation of network monitoring during latching FIP alarm

Name: Test activation of external bell under fire trip mode
Tag 1: Test the activation of the external bell under fire trip mode in accordance AS1670, BCA

Name: Test activation of external strobe under fire trip mode
Tag 1: Test the activation of the external strobe under fire trip mode in accordance AS1670, BCA
